story:
Gobbler, the happiest turkey, lived on a sunny farm surrounded by a chorus of chirping chickens and quacking ducks. One morning, a strong gust of wind knocked over a jar of glitter, scattering sparkles everywhere. Gobbler's eyes twinkled with excitement as he twirled and danced, leaving a trail of shimmering feathers behind him.

The farm animals watched in wonder as Gobbler's dance party brought joy to all. Even the grumpy old rooster cracked a smile. As the sparkles settled, Gobbler pranced around, proud of the magical moment he created. From that day on, the farm was filled with laughter and sparkles, thanks to Gobbler's special brand of turkey magic.
